alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 03 at 4:43AM PDT until November 04 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area, Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From noon to 10 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
